nodes.text: Rebel dark trooper hunters were specialized Rebel troopers of the Alliance to Restore the Republic trained to hunt down Imperial Dark troopers.

Rebel dark trooper hunters are Non-Player Characters (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. They appear in Special Forces Field Hospitals that can be placed by Rebel-aligned players and can only be entered by PVP-enabled ("Special Forces") players.
